snippet: Wolfgang Beltracchi, who pulled off the largest art fraud in Germany since World War II, told the German newsmagazine Der Spiegel that he had forged the work of about 50 different artists.
abstract: Wolfgang Beltracchi, who pulled off the largest art fraud in Germany since World War II, told the German newsmagazine Der Spiegel that he had forged the work of about 50 different artists.

headline.main: Convicted Art Forger Says More of His Works Are Out There
